display_long_description:
Escape the Dungeons of Hadrian's Wall. Your liberation awaits!

Escape from Hadrian's Wall is the debut game from fledgling studio Jim Gray Productions.

It is 402 AD in the Roman Province of Britannia. War has come to Hadrian's Wall. As a prisoner within the wall's dungeons, your journey of discovery begins with an unexpected alliance with a stranger, who provides you with magic tools to navigate the puzzles and obstacles throughout the fortress. Your task is to find the mage within the Wall, who has mysterious connections to the war, to the wall, and to dark and ancient magic. 

Elemental Golem Card Puzzles

Elemental Golems guard the passageways of Hadrian's Wall. These Golems must be defeated by summoning your own Golems. Using a set of magical Golem cards you solve puzzles to clear your path. Your objective is to dispel the enemy Golems by bringing each Golem's strength to 0 while preserving your own. Clever use of your Spell Cards and positioning will help you overcome your opponent in these battles of wit.

An Immersive and Magical Dungeon

Hadrian's Wall is host to many puzzles to test your puzzle-solving skills. A game built exclusively for VR, there are many unique gameplay moments that combine the opportunities of virtual reality with historical fiction and medieval fantasy. Play a magic instrument, mix potions, and blast spells from a mage's wand. Master your skills and conquer the secrets of Hadrian's Wall!
